question:
You are working for a company. You need to take some time off work and want to ask your manager about this.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:
1)Explain why you want to take time off work2)Give details of the amount of time you need.3)Suggest how you work could be covered while you are away.
text: I am writing this letter to grant my leave of absence from the office for the upcoming week from the 1st of July to the 10th of July.
I have decided to accompany my parents who are residing in my hometown Ambala city and want to spend some quality time with them.
Earlier I was unable to take some time off work due to the hectic office schedule and needed to work continuously in order to accomplish my targets.
At this time, I have only limited tasks to perform, therefore, I want to utilize this period in order to meet my parents. Additionally, It will make me feel relaxed after busy office hours.

In addition to it,Amar has agreed to take care of urgent work that requires immediate action.Moreover, She also agreed to send all the financial reports to higher authorities as well. However, I will be available on the call if any concern needs my attention.
I would really appreciate it if you could approve my leave application. Looking forward to hearing from your side.
